name: M.E.M.O
storyline:
In 2176, Shin Japan is plagued by various social issues.

Amidst this, a terrorist organization called "OUKAMI" threatens the government with the release of a deadly virus nationwide.

As a chosen agent, you must dive into the memories of the deceased to prevent this terror.

Retro landscapes of the mind, cryptic codes guarding old secrets, the truth of a world collapse 100 years ago...

Wandering through the maze of memories, can you find the key to save the future?
summary: Rely on nothing but your own wits. A first-person cryptographic adventure game that play with paper and pen. As you wander through the maze of memories, can you find the key to saving the future?
